name: genz-mail
description: Extension to append genz-style signoffs in gmail

scripts.stage: mkdir dist || echo Dist already exists.
scripts.bundle: browserify -o dist/gmailJsLoader.js src/gmailJsLoader.js && browserify -o dist/extension.js src/extension.js
scripts.build: npm run stage && npm run bundle

author: Mitiko <mitikodev@gmail.com>
